meanings.sent1: The droshkys glided gracefully through the snow-covered streets.

meanings.sent3: The droshkys raced each other in a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: The droshkys were like elegant chariots of the past.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the droshkys brought a touch of nostalgia to the town.
